text.sentence: ...that her husband can be so devious.
Here's hoping that you can join me in surprising Kim Watson for the 11th anniversary of her 29th birthday.
Her birthday is actually on December 17th, but a key part of the deception is surprising her early.
We hope to see you on Friday, December 8, at The Spires, 2001 Holcombe Blvd., Unit 2406 (77030).
If you need directions, you can call the front desk at (713) 799-2501.
Desserts, wine, coffee and soft drinks will be served.
The most current plan calls for folks to gather at our home between 7:30 and 8:00 p.m. on December 8.
Kim and I will be returning from our co-birthday dinner (both of us are December kiddos), no earlier than 8:00 p.m. and will proceed to unit 2406.
We'll come in and...(you know the rest...).
I need to have a rough head count of those who can make it, so please reply to this e-mail by December 6 with your RSVP, or you can leave me a voice mail at (281) 440-5300 x222.
Both are secure from Kim, so don't worry about using either of these methods.
If you've already told me you can't make it, you don't need to reply again.
Your presence will be gift enough.
Hope to see you on the 8th!
